title: Does Gradesaver really pay you if you submit them a well-written essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know which is worse—buying your written assignments or selling them. This industry is becoming legitimized. Articles on “how to write better” that cite essay-writing businesses, described as “helping” students with style and grammar, pop up in publications that should check for this. Communication is the number one in-demand skill in almost every industry. Enabling young people to bypass the chance to learn it makes a mockery of education.
You can get money from helping students cheat, but if you have no scruples, you can make much more as a contract killer or real estate developer.
